{{Infobox Radio station |image =| |name = ABC North West WA| |callsign = 6KP| |coordinates = {{Coord|20|44|14.30|S|116|50|58.20|E|type:landmark_scale:2000_region:AU}} |airdate = 22 August 1988| |frequency = 702 [[kilohertz|kHz]] [[amplitude modulation|AM]]
and others as listed| |area = [[Gascoyne (Western Australia)|Gascoyne]] and [[Pilbara]]| |owner = [[Australian Broadcasting Corporation]] | |format = [[Talk radio|Talk]] | |website = [http://www.abc.net.au/northwestwa/ http://www.abc.net.au/northwestwa/] | }} '''ABC North West WA''' is an [[ABC Local Radio]] station based in [[Karratha, Western Australia|Karratha]]. The station broadcasts to the [[Gascoyne (Western Australia)|Gascoyne]] and parts of the [[Pilbara]] regions of [[Western Australia]]. This includes the towns of [[Port Hedland, Western Australia|Port Hedland]], [[Carnarvon, Western Australia|Carnarvon]], [[Exmouth, Western Australia|Exmouth]], [[Newman, Western Australia|Newman]] and [[Tom Price, Western Australia|Tom Price]]. The station began as '''6KP''' in [[1988]] and now broadcasts through the following main [[AM Broadcasting|AM]] transmitters: *'''6KP''' 702 AM [[Karratha, Western Australia|Karratha]] *'''6CA''' 846 AM [[Carnarvon, Western Australia|Carnarvon]] *'''6MN''' 567 AM [[Newman, Western Australia|Newman]] *'''6PH''' 603 AM [[Port Hedland, Western Australia|Port Hedland]] *'''6PN''' 567 AM [[Pannawonica, Western Australia|Pannawonica]] *'''6PU''' 567 AM [[Paraburdoo, Western Australia|Paraburdoo]] *'''6TP''' 567 AM [[Tom Price, Western Australia|Tom Price]] *'''6XM''' 1188 AM [[Exmouth, Western Australia|Exmouth]] There are also a number of low power FM transmitters. When local programs are not broadcast the station is a relay of [[720 ABC Perth]]. ==References== {{cite web |title=Karratha ABC Station History |url= http://www.abc.net.au/local/stories/2008/03/10/2185611.htm |date=2003-03-10 |accessdate=2008-05-30 |publisher=[[ABC Online]] }} ==See also== * [[List of Australian radio stations]] {{ABC Local Radio}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Abc North West Wa}} [[Category:Radio stations in Western Australia]]
